SELECT count(LAW_STU_MEDIA.ID) FROM LAW_PERSONAL_COLLECTION, LAW_STU_MEDIA WHERE LAW_PERSONAL_COLLECTION.CREATE_USER = #{userId} AND LAW_PERSONAL_COLLECTION.TYPE = 1 AND LAW_PERSONAL_COLLECTION.SOURCE_ID = LAW_STU_MEDIA.ID
AND LAW_STU_MEDIA.stu_title LIKE '%' || #{stuTitle} || '%'
AND LAW_STU_MEDIA.STU_ISSUER LIKE '%' || #{stuIssuer} || '%'
AND LAW_STU_MEDIA.STU_LAWID = #{stuLawid}
AND LAW_PERSONAL_COLLECTION.CREATE_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND LAW_PERSONAL_COLLECTION.CREATE_TIME < = TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND LAW_STU_MEDIA.stu_type = #{stuType}

SELECT id AS "id", stu_code AS "stuCode", stu_title AS "stuTitle", com_content AS "comContent", stu_describe AS "stuDescribe", stu_time AS "stuTime", video_pic_acc AS "videoPicAcc"， stu_creat AS "stuCreat", stu_Issuer AS "stuIssuer", stu_Issdepartment AS "stuIssdepartment", stu_Optdepartment AS "stuOptdepartment", stu_Policeclass AS "stuPoliceclass", stu_From AS "stuFrom", stu_Type AS "stuType", stu_Knowledge AS "stuKnowledge", stu_Lawid AS "stuLawid", user_Name AS "userName", dept_Name AS "deptName" FROM LAW_STU_MEDIA WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT dataId,infoId,infoCode,TO_CHAR(infoName) as infoName,TO_CHAR(infoParentId),infoType FROM ( SELECT A . ID AS dataId, A . ID AS infoId, A .STU_CODE AS infoCode, A .STU_TITLE AS infoName, A .STU_LAWID AS infoParentId, A.DEL_STATUS, 'stu_' || A .stu_type || '_data' AS infoType, REGEXP_SUBSTR ( A.STU_LAWID, '[^,]+', 1, ROWNUM ) AS PARENT_ID FROM LAW_STU_MEDIA A
CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (A .STU_LAWID) - LENGTH ( REGEXP_REPLACE (A .STU_LAWID, ',', '') ) + 1 )aa where AA.DEL_STATUS = 0
and to_char(aa.PARENT_ID) in (select "ID" FROM LAW_CLASSIFY T START WITH T .CLASSIFY_CODE =#{dataId} CONNECT BY PRIOR T .id = T .PARENT_ID)
AND AA.infoType = 'stu_'||#{infoType}||'_data'
union ALL
SELECT DISTINCT dataId,infoId,infoCode,TO_CHAR(infoName)as infoName,TO_CHAR(infoParentId),infoType FROM ( SELECT A .ID AS dataId, 'case_'||A.case_type||'_'||A.ID AS infoId, A .CASE_CODE AS infoCode, A .CASE_TITLE AS infoName, A.case_Lawid AS infoParentId, a.DEL_STATUS, 'case_'||A.content_type||'_data' AS infoType, REGEXP_SUBSTR ( A.case_Lawid, '[^,]+', 1, ROWNUM ) AS PARENT_ID FROM LAW_CASE_ANALYSIS A
CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (A .case_Lawid) - LENGTH ( REGEXP_REPLACE (A .case_Lawid, ',', '') ) + 1 )aa where AA.DEL_STATUS = 0
and to_char(aa.PARENT_ID) in (select "ID" FROM LAW_CLASSIFY T START WITH T .CLASSIFY_CODE =#{dataId} CONNECT BY PRIOR T .id = T .PARENT_ID)
AND AA.infoType = 'case_'||#{infoType}||'_data'

SELECT count(DISTINCT(dataId)) FROM ( SELECT dataId,infoId,infoCode,TO_CHAR(infoName)as infoName,infoParentId,infoType FROM ( SELECT A . ID AS dataId, A . ID AS infoId, A .STU_CODE AS infoCode, A .STU_TITLE AS infoName, A .STU_LAWID AS infoParentId, A.DEL_STATUS, 'stu_' || A .stu_type || '_data' AS infoType, REGEXP_SUBSTR ( A.STU_LAWID, '[^,]+', 1, ROWNUM ) AS PARENT_ID FROM LAW_STU_MEDIA A

AND AA.infoType = 'stu_'||#{infoType}||'_data'
